        public static NewsBlog parse(JDCConnection oConn,
             java.lang.String sXMLBlogPath,
             java.lang.String sXMLFileName,

                      throws org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException,
                             java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                             java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                             java.io.IOException,
                             java.sql.SQLException
        Create a NewsBlog object by parsing its definition from an XML file
        Parameters:
        oConn - JDBC Database Connection
        sXMLBlogPath - String Directory path to blog definition files
        sXMLFileName - String Name of XML file containing the blog definition
        sEnc - String Character encoding, if null then UTF-8 is assumed.
        Returns:
        Menu object
        Throws:
        org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException
